```lisp
[
  (:action breathe ; Breathe to stabilize and change state in various scenarios
   :parameters (?entity - agent ?condition - state)
   :precondition (and (inCondition ?entity ?condition) (calm ?entity))
   :effect (and (stabilized ?entity) (not (negativeState ?entity)))
  )

  (:action free ; Free an entity from a constraint and update its status
   :parameters (?entity - agent ?constraint - constraint)
   :precondition (and (constrained ?entity ?constraint) (capable ?entity) (not (free ?entity ?constraint)))
   :effect (and (free ?entity ?constraint) (not (constrained ?entity ?constraint)))
  )

  (:action stay_safe
   :parameters (?npc - agent ?tool - tool ?hazardous_area - area)
   :precondition (and (inArea ?npc ?hazardous_area) (calm ?npc) (hasTool ?npc ?tool))
   :effect (and (onFirmGround ?npc) (not (inArea ?npc ?hazardous_area)))
  )

  (:action identify ; Identify a resource and update its status
   :parameters (?entity - object ?location - location)
   :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (not (identified ?entity)))
   :effect (and (identified ?entity) (not (unidentified ?entity)))
  )

  (:action mark ; Mark an entity and update its status
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object ?marker - marker)
   :precondition (and (identified ?entity) (at ?marker ?entity) (not (marked ?entity)))
   :effect (and (marked ?entity) (visible ?marker) (not (unmarked ?entity)))
  )

  (:action create ; Create a new state or transform an existing entity
   :parameters (?entity - object ?attribute - attribute)
   :precondition (and (identified ?entity) (not (has_attribute ?entity ?attribute)))
   :effect (and (has_attribute ?entity ?attribute) (created ?entity))
  )

  (:action inform ; Inform an entity about a resource and update their awareness status
   :parameters (?entity - agent ?resource - object)
   :precondition (and (identified ?resource) (marked ?resource) (safe ?entity) (not (informed ?entity)))
   :effect (and (informed ?entity) (aware ?entity ?resource))
  )
]
```
